participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma is passionate about music and helping others.
participant_1.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and cheerful, Jake finds joy in the simple things and loves spending time with his family.
participant_2.background: i enjoy coloring books. i live is a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. my husband is adopted.
